description: Gluten free buckwheat pancakes are a great way to start the day with extra veggies.
name: Buckwheat Spinach Pancakes with Smoked Salmon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the spinach in a large bowl with a drizzle of water and microwave for 1 minute to wilt. Drain well on kitchen paper.
Add the spinach to a blender with the egg, buttermilk and lemon zest and blend to a smooth puree.
Whisk the flour and baking powder together in a large bowl, pour the puree in and mix to combine. Add a tablespoon of water to loosen if the batter is too thick.

Heat a drizzle of oil in a nonstick pan on medium heat and spoon 2 tablespoons of batter in. Cook for 2 minutes until bubbles appear on the surface and the edges begin to set, then carefully flip and cook for 1 minute on the other side.
Repeat until you have 12 pancakes. Top with creme fraiche, smoked salmon and a squeeze of lemon and serve.
